services-description.line-1: Çeler Ahşap ve Dekorasyon is managed by the partnership of three brothers Ahmet Çeler, Musa Çeler and Cenk Çeler. Although it is established in the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus, it offers wood and decoration services to the entire island.
services-description.line-2: Our company, which reflects its 25 years of experience and experience on wooden doors, cabinets and kitchen products, has proven itself with this experience in decoration as well as production. Çeler Wood and Decoration is among the leading companies of the sector in Northern Cyprus with its staff of 27 people.
services-description.line-4: and with decoration service with different designs, it is at your side to meet your expectations at the highest level.
